Title: 1400/MR Appointment of a Principal Designer to support AWEC Development
Description:
Tender Opportunity 1400/MR – The University of Sheffield is seeking tenders from organisations to provide the Principal Designer Services to support a development at the University of Sheffield.

The ITT  and full specification can be downloaded by registering and expressing your interest on the University's e-tendering system https://in-tendhost.co.uk/Sheffield. Completed tenders must be returned through the same e-tendering system.

No ITT or specifications will be issued directly; these can only be accessed via the above route

If you have any questions or comments in relation to this tender they must be submitted via the Intend System, this can be accessed at https://in-tendhost.co.uk/Sheffield

The closing date for return of tenders is 12 noon on 25 April 2016 (UK time).

Title: Tender for Construction Related Specialist Consultancy Services - AWARD
Description:
Sandwell Metropolitan Borough Council (The Council) is seeking tenders from experienced organisations to assist in the delivery of a wide range of construction related specialist consultancy services to support and complement existing in-house service(s), all in accordance with these Tender Documents.
      
      The Council is located within the West Midlands Conurbation. This tender is being sought by Urban Design and Building Services (UDBS) based at Sandwell Council House, Oldbury.
      
      The Council will be using the In-tend e-Tendering System for this Procurement exercise, please visit https://in-tendhost.co.uk/sandwellmbc to access the Sandwell MBC In-tend Supplier Portal.
      
      From here you will be able to register your company, express an interest in the opportunity, and gain immediate access to PQQ or other related documents.
      
      In Order To View a On-Line Questionnaire (if applicable) or Submit a Tender, you will be required to` Opt-In`.   
      
      For a Step by Step user guide to the Sandwell MBC In-tend Supplier Portal please click on the `Guidance for Suppliers` section of the website. All procurement responses must be carried out via the Sandwell MBC In-tend Supplier Portal.  
      
      If you require further assistance in respect of the system please contact the In-tend support team on 0844 272 8810. 
      
      Closing date: Friday 25 January 2019 at 15:00hrs

Organisation Name: Cheshire Constabulary on behalf of the Police and Crime Commissioner for Cheshire
Title: Principal Designer for New Crewe Fire and Police Station
Description:
Cheshire Fire Authority are undertaking a construction project, in conjunction with Cheshire Police to rebuild their existing Fire Station at Crewe with a new Joint Fire and Police Station. As a part of the initial feasibility studies into this project the Fire Authority wishes to appoint a Principal Designer.  Framework Suppliers who have opted in and supplied the requested information by the Capability Assessment deadline are being invited to quote under the NHS SBS Construction Consultancy Framework SBS/17/NH/PZR/9256 - Principal Designer Lot 6  (North West - Band over £5m)

This is a contract award notice following a mini-competition under the NHS SBS Construction Consultancy Framework SBS/17/NH/PZR/9256 - Principal Designer Lot 6  (North West - Band over £5m)

The CFA are currently at Feasibility Stage for this project. Should the project proceed, the intention is to Procure on a Design & Build basis via an existing Framework.
